author: John von Neumann
summary: Von Neumann writes from Princeton about his recent work proving the quasi-ergodic theorem using an approach by Koopman and Weil, providing mathematical details about phase spaces and measurable sets. He also comments on the economic depression affecting both America and Europe, notes Dirac's presence at Princeton, and mentions his planned return to Europe in February.
title: Proving the Quasi-Ergodic Theorem
